main event: A witness observed a white, slightly elliptical UFO that moved erratically, went out of sight, and then reappeared briefly with a small light and exhaust.
interesting points: The UFO moved rapidly and changed course erratically.
The witness had also seen a similar object a year prior, in August 1959, where a beam of light passed over the trees at an estimated height of 25-30 feet.
The witness believes the object was a metallic, disk-shaped vehicle that reflected light and traveled at a very high rate of speed without making any sound.
The witness has a professional interest in such sightings and is somewhat skeptical of their own observations.
The sighting lasted for about 2 hours.
